verses.text: Yuj chi' mamin Job, ab' tas ol wala', cham tza maclej ab' in lolonel tik:
Yujto a spak a lolonel chi' ayxoek' t'a yol in ti' yic swalani.
Ha tas nab'il wuuj, ol wal t'ayach t'a stojolal yet' t'a smasanil in k'ool.
Ha Dios Syal Yuj Smasanil, ha' ix in b'oani, a tz'ak'an in k 'inal, yuj chi' pitzan in.
Tak'wanh t'ayin tato syal a pacani, na tas ol utej a colan a b'a.
Lajanonnhej ko chawanhil t'a yichanh Dios chi', anheja' t'a lum lum tik b'ob'il onh.
Yuj chi' max yal a xiv wuuj, max yal emnaquil ol ach wutej.
Icha tik ix wab' alani:
Wach'chom malaj in mul, malaj jab'oc in paltail, malaj chukal tzin k'ulej,
palta ha Dios sayan tas tz'aj yak'anoch t'a wib'anh, icha junok yajk'ol tzin yutej.
Ichato ix yak'och k'een cadena t'a woc, k'elannhejoch t'ayin b'ajtac tzin eq'ui, xa chi.
Palta a tas ix al tik manh wach'oclaj, yuj chi' ol wak' spak t'ayach: Ha Dios yelxo te ek'to yelk'och t'a quichanh a onh anima onh tik.
¿Tas yuj tzaloch t'a sat to max spak tas tzal t'ay?
Ha Dios chi' tzijtum macanhil syutej lolon sb'a, palta max nachajel-laj cuuj.
Ay b'aj slolon t'ak'walil, ma t'a wayichal, ma t'a ilwalil ayic te waynac onh.
Ha Dios slolon t'a ko pensar, yic tzonh cachjioch waan t'a tas sco k'ulej, icha chi' tz'aj onh xib'tanpaxi.
Icha chi' tzonh yutej Dios, yic wach' squik'el ko b'ha t'a skal chukal, yic manh comonoc squik'chaanh ko b'a.
Icha chi' syutej Dios onh scolanel t'a chamel yic wach' max onh sateli.
Ay pax b'aj jun, a yet' yaelal syak' ko cachnab'il Dios chi', scab'an wal syail t'a ko niwanil.
Masanil wael te wach' tz'ak'ji ko wa''a, tonhej sco yajeli.
Stz'onb'i ko niwanil, scheclajelta ko b'aquil t'a ko niwanil chi'.
Ichato sk'och ko niwanil b'aj smucchaj heb' chamnac, ayxoek' t'a yol sk'ab' chamel.
Palta q'uinaloc t'a skal jantac heb' schecab' Dios, sik'jielta junok te niwan yelk'ochi, scoti yic tzul kolwaj qued'oc, syalani tas smoj sco k'ulej,
sk'anan cuuj d'ha Dios to tz'ok' sk'ol t'ayonh. Sk'ananpax d'ha Dios chi' to max yik'el ko k 'inal, yujto chequelxo mach stupan yuj ko chukal chi'.
Icha chi' tz'aj sb'oxi ko k'ool, haxo ko niwanil tik tz'uninb'ixi, icha yic scotnac quelemal.
Ayic tzonh tewi d'ha Dios, syak'an swach'k'olal t'ayonh. Val t'a tzalajk'olal tzonh och ejmelal t'a yichanh Dios, scalan swach'k'olal t'a skal heb' quetanimail.
Scalan junjun onh t'a yichanh heb' anima icha tik: Ix och in mul, ix in k'ulej tas manh tojolok, palta ha Dios maj yal sk'ol ix yak'och in yaelal t'a smojal.
Ha ix yutej to ix in scol t'a yol sk'ab' chamel, yuj chi' tzato wil sakil k'inal, xco chama.
Icha chi' tzonh yutej Dios, manh jun chaelocnhej sk'ulej icha chi',
yuj onh scolanelta t'a yol sk'ab' chamel, yic skak'an tzalajb'oc jab'ocxo ko k'ool.
Mamin Job ab' wal tas ol wala'. Numan tzach aji yacb'an tzin loloni.
Tato ay tas tza nib'ej tzala', syal alan t'ayin. Tato ay tas snachaj uuj, ala', tzin nib'ej malaj tas skan t'a ib'anh.
Tato malaj tas tzal jun, maclej ab' tas ol wala', ol ach in k'ayb'ej t'a jelanil, xchi winhaj Eliú chi'.
